amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to responding to the economic and national security threats posed by human-induced climate change, as highlighted by the Secretary of Defense, the Director of National Intelligence, the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, and the Administrator of National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1014 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 115.

action.text: Amendment SA 1014 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Bennet. (consideration: CR S1995-1997, S2001; text: CR S1995) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to responding to the economic and national security threats posed by human-induced climate change, as highlighted by the Secretary of Defense, the Director of National Intelligence, the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, and the Administrator of National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1014 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 115.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1014 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 115.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1014 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Bennet.
